mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ENUM ( F_ENUM_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_ENUM_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{enumId}, #{ownerProjectId}, #{enumName}, #{title}, #{description}, #{note} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ENUM SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ownerProjectid}, F_ENUM_NAME = #{enumName}, F_TITLE = #{title}, F_DESCRIPTION = #{description}, F_NOTE = #{note} WHERE F_ENUM_ID = #{enumId}
mapper.select: SELECT F_ENUM_ID AS "enumId", F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", F_ENUM_NAME AS "enumName", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_ENUM WHERE F_ENUM_ID = #{enumId}
